content: Field #2 corn matures ~September 12, yield estimate ~155 bu/acre. Moisture check set for late August.
Field #9 sunflowers performing above average. If dryness persists, harvest may begin 1 week early.
metadata: Plot ID: SF-9, potential early date: late August 2025

content: Orchard #5 apples show good fruit set, but slight hail damage. Harvest likely mid-September.
Sweet potatoes in Field #11 nearing maturity. Warmer weather advanced the schedule by ~10 days.
metadata: Farm: Sunrise Acres, projected harvest: mid-October

content: Winter barley in Field #15 has moderate stand density. Might delay harvest 1 week if rainfall continues.
metadata: Farm: Brookside West, estimated yield: 90 bu/acre
